comment.body:
It's a pity that ICE's are being extinguished so violently, while the coal and gas industry can go on with their impact on the environment without consequence. When is the deadline for coal power stations? When will they be forced to move to green energy? My guess is, they won't anytime soon.
Electric driving is at least as bad as driving fuel if the electricity is not green. Not to mention the polluting production process of these batteries.

@Krixano: Decentralized is the way to go here in ZeroNet. ;) I know that a centralized service in ZeroNet is still decentralized, but a centralized service may get to much of an influence, resulting in indirectly damaging the smaller player. Or am I over-reacting? lol
Anyway, I'd prefer the choice to make the zite cloneable per project.
